name: @inst-app/basic-template
description: A basic configurable template engine with conditionals and variable replacement.
author: Jared Lunde

scripts.build: yarn run build:es && yarn run build:cjs && yarn prettier
scripts.build:es: rm -rf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir dist/es
scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir dist/cjs
scripts.prettier: yarn run prettier:es && yarn run prettier:cjs
